column2: Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach (Deputy Joe McHugh)
Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach (Deputy Joe McHugh)
column5: I move:That the proposal that Dáil Éireann approve the terms of the Kigali Amendment to the Montreal Protocol on substances that deplete the ozone layer, done at Kigali on the 15th day of October 2016, a copy of which was laid before Dáil Éireann on 16th November 2017, be referred to the Select Committee on Communications, Climate Action and Environment, in accordance with Standing Order 84A(3)(b), which, not later than 13th February 2018, shall send a message to the Dáil in the manner prescribed in Standing Order 90, and Standing Order 89(2) shall accordingly apply.
